sentences: The contact group convened briefly in the evening to introduce the Co-Chairs ` draft conclusions on the GEF's report to the COP; a draft decision on the review of the financial mechanism; and a draft decision on additional guidance to the GEF.
Delegates could not reach consensus on preambular references to mitigation and adaptation.
On the GEF performance, delegates did not agree to the Co-Chairs proposal to simply note conclusions of the Third Overall Performance Study of the GEF (OPS3).
A small drafting group met late in the evening.
